[actions](./carbonio-ui-preview.headerprops.actions.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

[HeaderAction](./carbonio-ui-preview.headeraction.md)<!-- -->\[\]


</td><td>

Actions for the preview.

Note: by default the actions does not prevent the default behavior nor the propagation of the event. This means that a click on an action will cause a click on the preview overlay too, resulting in the preview to close.

To prevent the preview to close when an action is clicked, the onClick callback should invoke the preventDefault on the event received.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[closeAction?](./carbonio-ui-preview.headerprops.closeaction.md)

_(Optional)_ Left Action for the preview
